title: The Girl From the Sea
description: The Girl from the Sea book description: Richie, a young man fell in love with Lauryn, a mermaid. To Lauryn's parents, it's a forbidden love and a shame for the mermaid princess to fall in love with a human. Richard determined to prove his love for Lauryn. He offered to go with her to get the water of life in Antarctica, home of killer whale for the cure of the king and release of the captured sea beings by humans. But first, they have to pass through the Shark's kingdom. Find out if they will ever return from this dangerous journey?
author: Bimpe Gold-Idowu
